class.rdfs:comment: A chemical substance is 'a portion of matter of constant composition, composed of molecular entities of the same type or of different types' (source: [ChEBI:59999](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/chebi/searchId.do?chebiId=59999)).
class.rdfs:label: ChemicalSubstance

schema:chemicalComposition.rdfs:comment: The chemical composition describes the identity and relative ratio of the chemical elements that make up the substance.
schema:chemicalComposition.rdfs:label: chemicalComposition

schema:chemicalRole.rdfs:comment: A role played by the BioChemEntity within a chemical context.
schema:chemicalRole.rdfs:label: chemicalRole

schema:potentialUse.rdfs:comment: Intended use of the BioChemEntity by humans.
schema:potentialUse.rdfs:label: potentialUse
